text: Hey guys, has anyone tried to change the email address of their developer account? I followed the guide but I don't see any option to edit the email address as stated on the docs. Attached is a screenshot. I'd really appreciate if someone could guide me in the right direction.

Hi everyone, I am a newbie developer and just created a HubSpot developer account just to learn how to create themes on my own. Is it necessary to provide company details (I don't own a company)  to create a website?
I am following the guide here <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started-with-themes> and stuck at Step 3.
Thanks!

Hello everyone,
I'm trying to implement "intl-tel-plugin" that I found on this article
<https://www.twilio.com/blog/international-phone-number-input-html-javascript>
But I can't really figure out how to get the HubSpot form inputs in my JS file to access and modify it's value (i.e add country code) for the user's ease, does anyone know how can I do that ?
